title.full: London 2012  - The Official Video Game of the Olympic Games Demo

description.full: The Olympic Games are responsible for some of the most memorable scenes in sporting history. Itâ€™s the global stage where dreams are realised, heroes are made and moments that will be remembered for years happen right before your eyes. Now you too can create your own moments with London 2012 - The Official Video Game of the Olympic Games. Download the demo now and get your first taste of Olympic action in the 110 Metre hurdles and Kayak Slalom.
description.short: It's your first chance to get into the heart of the action with London 2012 The Official Video Game of the Olympic Games. Download the demo right now and enjoy the 110 Metre hurdles and the Kayak Slalom to whet your appetite ahead of the full game's release.
